long_description: With its minimal weight and technical design, the sleek Deuter ACT Lite 75 + 10 Pack is a good-looking, lightweight and reliable companion on extended backpacking trips. Slim pack body and compact hipbelt allow freedom of movement when trekking or mountaineering. Multi-layer hipbelt with pull-forward function makes it easy to fasten, even with even heavy loads. Lightweight multi-chamber aluminum X-frame. Separate bottom compartment, stretch front compartment, mesh side pockets and twin lid buckles provide more options for storage. Front gear loops on the Deuter ACT Lite 75 + 10 Pack let you easily attach a sleeping pad to the outside.
short_description: With its minimal weight and technical design, the sleek Deuter ACT Lite 75 + 10 Pack is a good-looking, lightweight and reliable companion on extended backpacking trips.
